Mod0_Description: Every {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} seconds, {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} intensifies, causing incoming damage to grant you {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds.
Mod1_Description: Enemies Knocked Back by {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
Mod2_Description: Enemies who are Knocked Back by {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} are also Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_SLOW}{/c} seconds.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat Effect Chance}|%|]{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} Powerful winds surround you, granting {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|1%|]{/c} Non-Physical Damage Reduction.  

{c_label}Active:{/c} The winds rapidly expand, Knocking Back enemies and dealing {c_number}{payload:KNOCKBACK}{/c} damage.
name: Cyclone Armor
simple_desc: Defensive Skill: Winds surround you, dampening Non-Physical attacks and Knocking Back melee attackers.
